data.title: ADBE Stock Price, Company Overview & News
data.meta_description: Adobe, Inc. engages in the provision of digital marketing and media solutions. It operates through the following segments: Digital Media, Digital Experience,
data.text:
Trump Demands FBI Director—Originally Hired By Him—Resign Over Biden’s ‘Cognitive Degeneration’

Former President Donald Trump nominated Christopher Wray to the FBI in his first year in office.

Why Has Tottenham Been So Quiet In The Summer Transfer Window?

Tottenham Hotspur has signed Archie Gray, but the North London club has been otherwise quiet in the summer transfer window.

Click in to hear “Fire Fire Fire, Hiss,” an unnerving song sung by Nicolas Cage’s serial killer character in "Longlegs."

Two battalions face a hard choice: fight their way out or hope for rescue

Eric Stokes, who played in just three games last year due to foot and hamstring injuries, is off to a strong start this summer.

Biden Believes He Could Still Serve Another Term—Despite Leaving 2024 Race, White House Says

White House Press Secretary Karine Jean-Pierre gave her first press conference Wednesday since Biden announced Sunday he would bow out of the race.

The Apparel Industry’s Stubborn Low-Tech Forecasting Problem

The apparel industry's outdated forecasting faces challenges. AI offers solutions, but brands like Burberry struggle. Explore industry issues and potential fixes.

It was the tech-heavy Nasdaq's worst day since 2022 as all four of the U.S.' $2 trillion stocks suffered at least 3% losses.

Patriots’ Matthew Judon Enters Contract Year Knowing There Are No Guarantees

Matthew Judon is scheduled to earn $7.5 million in the final year of his New England Patriots contract. But the four-time Pro Bowler hopes that the schedule changes.

Bolt's Former Billionaire Founder Is In Legal Trouble — Again

This year, the former billionaire settled a lawsuit that alleged he’d defaulted on a loan insured by Bolt. Now, angry investors in the startup, including BlackRock, have blocked it.

U.S. Grows Its Leads In Natural Gas Production And LNG Exports

This article discusses key insights from the 2024 Global Energy Review, highlighting trends in natural gas production, consumption, and market shifts, with the U.S. leading in LNG exports.

Fox News Proposes Sept. 17 Trump-Harris Debate—After Trump Suggests Network Host Next Face-Off

Trump said Sunday he wanted Fox, instead of ABC, to host the next debate.

Protesters Removed From Netanyahu’s Speech To Congress

Benjamin Netanyahu spent part of his speech criticizing the heated protests that flared earlier this year, calling protesters critical of Israel “Iran’s useful idiots.”

Weird Al Yankovic Will Live For Eternity: A Chat With The Everlasting Accordion Aficionado

Weird Al Yankovic discusses covering Taylor Swift and Cardi B, 'The Bear,' and his new song "Polkamania."
